title: The Memory of Lost Dreams
description: Reylan Hawke stood in awe at the breathtaking sight before him. There lay a ruined underground city with shattered skyscrapersâ€”only looking with more devastation beyond his imagination. So, what had caused this to happen? By mere chance, he stumbled upon a mysterious machine called REQUIEM, which whisked him away to a dystopian world ruled by advanced technology and engulfed in unyielding fear. And escape seems impossible.Note that prior editions released from 2016 to August 2024 have differing storylines compared to the current edition, released in September 2024, with the most recent update in February 2025.The main character's new name for the third edition (2024) is "Reylan Hawke," which first appeared in September 2024. The main character's old name, "Malik Soules," was last used in the second edition (2018).The front cover art dates back to circa 2017.
author: Davon M. Custis
